segments.text: Thank you for bringing me here Hong , this place looks great !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re welcome . Would you like some cold dishes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . How about the lotus root ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , and anything to drink ? Maybe some jasmine tea ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes that would be nice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And for your main course ? I can recommend the sizzling beef .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I ’ m vegetarian so I ’ d like to have the bean curd .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that ’ s a good choice . Very healthy too .
segments.speaker: S2
